name: Create a new Webhook
fullName: Pipedrive API v1/Webhooks#Create a new Webhook
description: Creates a new Webhook and returns its details. Note that specifying an event which triggers the Webhook combines 2 parameters - `event_action` and `event_object`. E.g., use `*.*` for getting notifications about all events, `added.deal` for any newly added deals, `deleted.persons` for any deleted persons, etc. See the guide for Webhooks for more details.
descriptionHtml: Creates a new Webhook and returns its details. Note that specifying an event which triggers the Webhook combines 2 parameters - `event_action` and `event_object`. E.g., use `.` for getting notifications about all events, `added.deal` for any newly added deals, `deleted.persons` for any deleted persons, etc. See the guide for Webhooks for more details.
